name: The Phantom Tako's Void Escape
description:
Our daring and mysterious masked Takodatchi has done the 'forbidden squish' and must now make a quick escape through the Void.

Controls: Repeatedly press/tap Space or Left Mouse Button to jump/move up

Travel though the void to the exit, touching the void slows you down. Don't get caught by Ina's tentacles.

Good Luck Takodatchi (=w=)7

The game has no sound as in the void no one can hear you WAH (that's my excuse and I'm sticking to it).

Made in and for the 48 hour - 2nd Vtuber Game Jam 2022
